title: Fixed countdown, finally. Added ability to switch between Gregorian and Islamic…
message: Fixed countdown, finally. Added ability to switch between Gregorian and Islamic calendars. Added data check so when there are no prayer times data, no data page is shown.

title: Oh boy, updated many stuff. There is basically a main prayer times screen which…

title: Initial implementation of the progressing location selection. Now you can select…
message: Initial implementation of the progressing location selection. Now you can select country, then city, then district. It has almost no error handling and no state saving yet.

title: First real commit! I implemented an extension to RecyclerView called…
message: First real commit! I implemented an extension to RecyclerView called IndexedRecyclerView for indexed, fast scrolling. It is not perfect but it does the trick. Web service integration also works. Countries are downloaded from Muezzin API now. There is also a file based persistence. I think it will be enough at the moment. The rest can come more easily now.
